channel.title: Paradise Sets - Sylent // Feedback Please
channel.description:
Guys its been like 5 months until my last song release. And this is my first song after all that time. I think my songs are worse now because of all the time i haven't been producing.I want to know if its really better or worse so feedback on that would be appreaticed.
https://soundcloud.com/user-123297002
I need feedback about the song more so that would be much appreaticed.Thanks. Tell me what you all think about the song.

item.title: Paradise Sets - Sylent // Feedback Please
item.dc:creator: Sylent
item.description:
Thanks so much for the feedback! I thought no one was going to give me any feedback.

I dont know how tp change the url

Yes i think that the chords sounds random too
If you could give me any advice on making harmonic and competible chords that would be amazing(since your chord progressions are amazing on your songs You know how to make chord progressions)

Yes i took out that weird bass from the song for spotify release.

Other than that if you have extra tips that would be cool too

Thanks a lot for the feedback again .

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise Sets - Sylent // Feedback Please
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
Feedback:

  1. Change your SoundCloud URL to something else than user-2087239874

Actual feedback:

  1. This may be just me, but having ducker without a kick sounds kinda weird
  2. Chords sound a little bit random (also could be just me)
  3. Mix is a little muddy with the bass
  4. Nice percussion, fits the tropical feel

Overall, nice job. The issue for me was just the chords and the muddiness of the mix which made it kinda hard to listen to. Other than that, it sounds cool!

Read full topic
